phases.name: Phase 1 – Hardware Foundations & Modern Embedded C++
phases.description: Calibrate hardware lab, sharpen modern C++ for microcontrollers, and build disciplined debugging habits. End goal: confidently shipping bring-up firmware on STM32 and ESP32 targets.

tasks.title: C Variables and Data Types
tasks.ai_prompt: Learn int, char, float, arrays, and memory sizes

tasks.title: Control Flow: Loops
tasks.ai_prompt: Master for, while, do-while with break/continue

tasks.title: Functions and Prototypes
tasks.ai_prompt: Write functions with parameters and return values

tasks.title: Pointer Arithmetic
tasks.ai_prompt: Navigate arrays and memory using pointer math

tasks.title: Voltage Fundamentals
tasks.ai_prompt: Understand voltage as electrical potential difference

tasks.title: Kirchhoff Voltage Law
tasks.ai_prompt: Apply KVL to analyze series circuits

tasks.title: Voltage Measurement
tasks.ai_prompt: Use multimeter for accurate voltage readings

tasks.title: Resistor Networks
tasks.ai_prompt: Analyze series, parallel, and mixed networks

tasks.title: Power Ratings
tasks.ai_prompt: Select resistors based on power dissipation

tasks.title: Linux Command Line Basics
tasks.ai_prompt: Navigate filesystem with cd, ls, pwd

tasks.title: File Operations
tasks.ai_prompt: Use cp, mv, rm, cat, and redirections

tasks.title: Text Processing
tasks.ai_prompt: Apply grep, sed, awk for text manipulation

tasks.title: Bitwise Operations
tasks.ai_prompt: Apply AND, OR, XOR, NOT, shifts

phases.name: Phase 2 – Real-Time Systems & Connected Firmware
phases.description: Deepen RTOS mastery, tackle open RISC-V/ESP32-C3 bring-up, design resilient connectivity stacks, and harden security for fleet-ready firmware. Culminates in a production-quality Zephyr/FreeRTOS application spanning CAN, Ethernet, BLE, and secure provisioning.

phases.name: Phase 3 – Edge Intelligence, Safety & Manufacturing Readiness
phases.description: Blend TinyML with safety-critical practices, Android Automotive integration, and manufacturing readiness. Harden products for compliance while building intelligent firmware paired with production test rigs and certification artefacts.
